name: Rossignol Rossignol X3 Boots - Men's
description: Versatile boots for recreational touring. The X3 Boots prioritize comfort and warmth while offering good mobility, stability and control. The Free-flex design puts maximum energy into each kick, for a powerful classic technique.Ergonomic lace covers protect against cold and snow.Velcro® power strap fits snug to enhance mobility, stability and control of your skis.Speed-lock lacing system gets you into your skis and out in the snow faster.Quick-dry inner linings keep your feet comfortable all day.Thermomouldable liners let you customize the fit.Active heel support provides lots of control.Nylon midsoles have metal reinforcements.Toebox, midsole and heel are reinforced for increased durability when exploring on and off-trail.TPR bi-injected (dual-material) sole has double grooves for all-terrain performance.Compatible with Turnamic/NNN bindings.
